BR_text.BRsummary: Error: Test failed: ''itertools" is not defined
BR_text.BRdescription:
When I import the landmark model(landmarks-regression-retail-0009.xml and landmarks-regression-retail-0009.bin),one error happened:
 <denchmark-h:h3>Checking request has returned the "failed" status. Message: Exception: Model was not properly created/updated. Test failed: ''itertools" is not defined</denchmark-h>
 
 I add  code "import itertools" in the file（ cvat/cvat/apps/auto_annotation/inference.py ）,then rebuild the cvat docker. It work well.
 from .model_loader import ModelLoader
 from cvat.apps.engine.utils import import_modules, execute_python_code
 <denchmark-h:h3>import itertools</denchmark-h>
 
 def _process_detections(detections, path_to_conv_script, restricted=True):
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/benhoff>@benhoff</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nmanovic>@nmanovic</denchmark-link>
